quote.issuer_name: CCID Consulting Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: CCID Consulting Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: CCID Consulting Co Ltd is a China-based company that mainly provides comprehensive information services and modern information technology services. The Company operates through four segments. The Management and Strategic Consulting Services segment mainly provides services including application and implementation of enterprise management information digitalization services. The Market Consulting Services segment is mainly engaged in standard research and tailor-made research on specific industries. The Information Engineering Supervision Services segment mainly provides information engineering supervision services to contracting projects. The Conference Consulting and Hosting Services segment is mainly engaged in providing system services such as conference and exhibition event planning for industry associations, enterprises, and local governments. The Company also provides data information design services, training course services and purchasing information system services.
